|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cgim, c2)), wss(c3, c4)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cgim, c2)), wss(c3, c4)), wb(wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(cima(c0, c3), cfv(csubg, c2))))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(cima(c0, c3), cfv(csubg, c2))), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cima(c0, c3)), cfv(csubg, c1)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cgim, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈(c1[GrpIso]c2)∧ c3 ⊆ c4)→(c3 ∈(SubGrp ` c1)↔(c0 " c3)∈(SubGrp ` c2)))
⊣ c4 =(Base ` c1)
⊣ ((c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2)∧(c0 " c3)∈(SubGrp ` c2))→(`' c0 "(c0 " c3))∈(SubGrp ` c1))
⊣ (c0 ∈(c1[GrpIso]c2)→ c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2))
